My predstavymo Peklo, na shcho denʹ, do disbelievers
Vony yavlyayutʹ soboyu chyyi ochi nadto veiled pobachyty Moye povidomlennya. Ne mohly vony chuyutʹ
tsey khto disbelieve dumayutʹ shcho vony mozhutʹ pity z vstanovlyuyuchymy Moyimy sluzhbovtsyamy tomu shcho bohy bilya Meni? My mayemo hotove do disbelievers Pekla yak vichnoho abode
Kazhu, ya 'Budu kazaty vam khto nayhirshyy losers
Vony yavlyayutʹ soboyu chyyi pratsi u tsʹomu zhytti povnistyu astray, ale vony dumayutʹ shcho vony roblyatʹ harnyy

Yikhniy spravedlyvyy requital Peklo, v obmin na yikhniy disbelief, ta dlya toho, shchob vysmiyuvaty Moyi vidkryttya ta Moyi kur'yery
